content.en: Being out in the sun with friends feels good! Doing this when we're exercising, having fun, and helping others feels GREAT!
content.tw: 在太陽下跟朋友玩很享受，如果可以同時運動跟幫助人，感覺更棒!

content.en: About three hundred people met one day. Some were adults and many were kids. Schools sent lots of students! The people were meeting to exercise. There were hundreds of exercise bikes!
content.tw: 有一天，300 個大人小孩聚在一起運動，還有學校派學生參加，現場有好幾百台腳踏車。

content.en: But these bikes are not like the bikes in gyms or sports centers. And they are not like the bike in your living room … you know, the one your dad or mom doesn't use anymore! These exercise bikes make electricity!
content.tw: 但這些腳踏車不是一般健身房那種，它們可以發電!

content.en: The people got on the bikes. They started pedaling! As they pedaled, the bikes made electricity. The more the people pedaled, the more electricity they made!
content.tw: 這些人坐上腳踏車猛踩踏板，這些踏板會發電，所以越多人踩踏板，就能製造越多電力!

content.en: Together the people made more than 10,000 watts of energy. That can give electricity to two homes for 24 hours! They gave the electricity they made to people who need it.
content.tw: 他們製造超過 1 萬瓦電力，可以供兩個家庭使用 24 小時，最後電力送給需要的人。

content.en: Everyone had a great day! Together with their friends, they exercised, had fun, and helped others!
content.tw: 大家都度過了美好的一天! 他們跟朋友一起運動、玩樂，還幫助了別人!

vocabulary.preface: 騎腳踏車可以發電，電力還可以供應住家呢!

content.text:
1. exercise 運動。
That was lots of fun! 真是有趣!
Yeah, I forgot how much I enjoy biking. 對啊，我都忘了我有多喜歡騎車。It's great exercise too! 它也是很棒的運動。
I hope I burned at least 500 calories. 我希望至少燒掉了五百卡路里。

2. gym 健身房。
And it's way better than the gym. 比健身房好多了。
Totally. Fresh air and sunshine win every time! 當然輸給新鮮空氣跟陽光。

3. together 一起。
We should do this every week. 我們應該每星期都來。
Good idea. Let's do it together with the kids. 好主意，來跟小孩一起騎。

4. pedal 踩踏板。
My 3-year-old has yet to learn how to pedal. 我的三歲小孩還沒有學會踩踏板。
No worries. He'll learn fast. 別擔心，他會學很快的。
